chapter.text: “Ndikulumbilira mitengo ya Mkuyu ndi Zitona (pansi pa mitengo imeneyi Ibrahim ndi Nuh (Nowa) adapeza uneneri
“Ndi phiri la Sinai (pamene Allah adamulankhulira Mûsa)
“Ndiponso mzinda uwu (wolemekezeka) wamtendere; (Makka, womwe adapatsiridwa uneneri Muhammad) (s.a.w)
“Palibe chikaiko, tamulenga munthu mkalengedwe kabwino, kolingana (ndipo ali ndi mbiri zabwino)
“Pambuyo pake tamubwezera pansi kumposa wa pansi
“Kupatula amene akhulupirira ndikumachita zabwino, adzakhala nawo iwo malipiro osatha
“Tsono nchiyani chakuchititsa kuti ukanire kuuka ndi malipiro pambuyo (poona mphamvu zathu pa chilichonse)
“Kodi Allah si Muweruzi wa nzeru kuposa aweruzi onse
